title: Exclusive NEOSTRATA Anti-Aging Firming Duo
category: Brands / NEOSTRATA / Exclusive NEOSTRATA Anti-Aging Firming Duo
description:
This anti aging neck cream is formulated with three clinically proven matrix building ingredients, each with a unique action to deliver optimal lifting and firming. ProAmino Acid helps stimulate procollagen production in the skin’s deep layers, while NeoCitriate™ helps promote new collagen and NeoGlucosamine® builds the surrounding support matrix. This trio of state-of-the-art actives works together to plump, build volume and firm sagging skin. NeoGlucosamine® is also a gentle exfoliant that helps reduce the appearance of uneven pigment and age spots that often appear in the décolletage. This potent cream is fortified with Apple Stem Cell Extract to help protect the longevity of skin’s essential cells, helping your skin to behave like younger skin. 
 "Volumizes the look of slack skin with AMINOFIL® 
 Amino acid derivative concentrated to target skin’s hydrating matrix for a more lifted appearance. Renews Tone with Gluconolactone 
 A Polyhydroxy Acid & antioxidant chelator that helps to gently exfoliate and promote a more even skin tone. Smooths Skin with LMW Hyaluronic Acid 
 Due to its unique small size, LMW (Low Molecular Weight) Hyaluronic Acid penetrates skin’s surface to attract moisture, providing hydration to visibly improve skin’s texture."
ingredients:
Aqua (Water), Acetyl Glucosamine, Cyclopentasiloxane, Triethyl Citrate, Cetearyl Alcohol, C1215 Alkyl Benzoate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate, Ethoxydiglycol Oleate, Dimethicone, Cyclohexasiloxane, Ethoxydiglycol, PEG100 Stearate, lymethylsilsesquioxane,Nylon12, Isostearic Acid, Tocopheryl (Vitamin E) Acetate, Palmitoyl Glycine, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract, Hydrogenated Palm Kernel Glycerides, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Dimethiconol, Isopropyl Myristate, Caprylyl Glycol, Lecithin, PEG40 Stearate, Ceteareth20, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Pentaerythrityl TetraDitButyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Bisulfite, Disodium EDTA, Ammonium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylene Brassylate, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Isobutyl Methyl Tetrahydropyranol, Methyl Decenol, Caramel, CI 19140 (Yellow 5).

title: PMD Clean (1 piece)
category: Brands / PMD / PMD Clean (1 piece)
description:
Give yourself a mini facial with help from PMD's Clean. Chic and portable, this skin care device features SonicGlow™ technology with over 7,000 vibrations per minute that deeply cleanses, tones and lifts for a more youthful-looking complexion. 
  Key Benefits:  
 
  With 7,000 vibrations per minute, Clean deeply removes the skin’s impurities by breaking down dirt and oil from within the pores. 
  Using ultra-hygienic silicone, Clean is odor-resistant, antibacterial, hypoallergenic and waterproof. This hassle-free brush head never needs replacing. 
  A powerful cleansing device with bristles gentle enough for all skin types. With four customizable modes, Clean provides a full spectrum of cleansing options. 
  Supercharge your skin care regimen by using their SonicGlow™ technology to massage serums and moisturizer into skin for a more youthful look. 
  PMD recommends using mode 3 or 4 for massaging. Apply skincare products and use back side of the Clean to gently massage. Serum will be more effective and absorb deeper into the skin.
ingredients:
Silicone AA Battery.
For the latest information, it is recommended to review the ingredient list printed on the packaging of the product prior to usage or consumption.

For the latest information, it is recommended to review the ingredient list printed on the packaging of the product prior to usage or consumption.
how_to_use:
Step 1: Rinse and Apply Cleanser.
  Rinse face with warm water and gently rub in cleanser.
  Step 2: Wet and Power on Device.
  Rinse Clean under water and power on device. We recommend modes 1 and 2 for optimum cleansing results.
  Step 3: Smart Cleansing.
  Move brush head in circular motions, cleansing entire face. It is safe to spend more time in areas that may be of a personal concern.
  Step 4: Rinse and Pat Dry.
  Rinse face and Clean of any excess cleanser then pat dry.

Step 4: Rinse and Pat Dry.
Rinse face and Clean of any excess cleanser then pat dry.

title: NEOM Focus the Mind Essential Oil Blend 0.3 fl. oz
category: Brands / NEOM / NEOM Focus the Mind Essential Oil Blend 0.3 fl. oz
description:
Bringing you back to the present moment in a snap, the  Focus the Mind Essential Oil Blend  from natural wellbeing brand  NEOM  zaps you with an energising aroma that promotes razor-sharp attention. It stimulates your senses with a complex blend of 100% natural essential oils from Pine, Cedarwood and Eucalyptus, a trio expertly curated to boost mental clarity and enhance concentration. 
 Compatible with your NEOM Wellbeing Pod, the fragrant oil imbues your personal interior spaces with layers of Green Hibiscus notes mingled with deeper, woody undertones that create a balsamic effect. You can even add a few drops to a hot bath or use it for an oil massage to get your mind and body feeling active and in the zone. 
  Made with 100% natural essential oils.  
   Please note:    This bottle contains up to 30 uses, with 5-10 drops per use.
ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Juniperus Mexicana Wood Oil, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus Leaf Oil, Limonene, Cinnamaldehyde, Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil, Cinnamomum Cassia Leaf Oil, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Thuja Occidentalis Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract, Maltol, Cinnamaldehyde, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.

how_to_use:
To experience the full Feel Good Vibes Essential Oil Blend experience, use in your Wellbeing Pod.

Fill the water tank of the Wellbeing Pod with cold water. Do not exceed the maximum water level line
Add up to 10 drops of the Feel Good Vibes Essential Oil Blend.
With the touch of a button, it will instantly release a heatless, fine mist of aromatheraphy oil blend for stress, in a scented vapour into the atmosphere, to stimulate your senses and help boost your wellbeing
Alternatively you can also add 5 drops to a warm bath, or 1 to 2 drops to your chosen base oil for a calming and relaxing massage
raw_how_to_use:
To experience the full Feel Good Vibes Essential Oil Blend experience, use in your Wellbeing Pod.

  • Fill the water tank of the Wellbeing Pod with cold water. Do not exceed the maximum water level line
  • Add up to 10 drops of the Feel Good Vibes Essential Oil Blend.
  • With the touch of a button, it will instantly release a heatless, fine mist of aromatheraphy oil blend for stress, in a scented vapour into the atmosphere, to stimulate your senses and help boost your wellbeing
  • Alternatively you can also add 5 drops to a warm bath, or 1 to 2 drops to your chosen base oil for a calming and relaxing massage

title: Briogeo Curl Charisma™ Rice Amino + Avocado Hydrating Shampoo 8 oz
category: Brands / Briogeo / Briogeo Curl Charisma™ Rice Amino + Avocado Hydrating Shampoo 8 oz
description:
Briogeo's Curl Charisma™ Rice Amino + Avocado Hydrating Shampoo gives waves, curls, and coils the gentle and nourishing care it needs. This creamy, sulfate-free shampoo-hydrates and cleanses without stripping hair of natural oils and minimizes frizz to enhance definition. Rice amino acids help seal the hair cuticle and lockout frizz-causing humidity while tomato fruit ferment enhances moisture retention to support uniform curl formation. 
  Key Ingredients:  
 
   Rice Amino Acids:  smooth down and help control frizz 
   Shea Butter:  deeply hydrates and retains moisture in hair 
   Vitamin E:  protects hair from free-radical damage 
   Tomato Fruit Ferment Extract:  helps encourage curl formation 
 
  Key Benefits:  
 
  Cleanses and hydrates waves, curls, and coils 
  Creamy, sulfate-free formula 
  Combats frizz 
  Enhances moisture retention

  Dermalogica Super Rich Repair (1.7 fl. Oz)

how_to_use:
Super Rich Repair: Apply to face and neck with light, upward strokes. Wait for cream to absorb before applying additional products. Use twice daily. Store at room temperature.
Dynamic Skin Retinol Serum: After cleansing, apply a thin layer over face. Keep out of eyes. Use nightly. If dryness or redness occurs, reduce frequency. Wear an SPF during the day.

title: Miriam Quevedo Sublime Gold Shampoo 250ml
category: Brands / miriam quevedo / Miriam Quevedo Sublime Gold Shampoo 250ml
description:
Exquisite ultra-nourishing and restorative shampoo that has rejuvenating properties and adds an exceptional shine to hair. Sublime formula powered by Bioactive 24k Gold, Wild Olive Tree Stem Cells and Vitamin D Nectar, which deeply nourishes without making the hair heavy and and helps to regenerate the heart of the hair fiber and scalp. It acts as a shield against the effects of aging and to protect the color, as well as infusing your hair with renewed youth. 
  Key Benefits:  
 
  Helps reduce hair aging at the cellular level 
  Contributes to liberate hair and scalp of impurities and residues 
  Its active ingredients intensely nourish, repair and regenerate the heart of the hair fiber and the scalp 
  Its active ingredients strength the internal structure of the hair, repairing damage and broken links 
  Has highly protective properties against aggressors such as harsh salon treatments, pollution, UV rays or oxidative stress 
  Revitalizes the hair, infusing it with a renewed youth 
  Provides sublime shine and luminosity with more intense reflections thanks to 24 k micronized gold 
  Has moisturizing, anti irritant, and antioxidant properties 
  Enhances the softness, silkiness and shine of the hair 
  Vegan formula without SLES sulfates with multi benefit natural surfactants 
  Minimizes color loss through successive washes helps retain more than 96 of color after 10 washes 
  Mild, non aggressive with hair or scalp 
  Provides a polishing effect by preventing peeling of the cuticle 
  Respectfully sourced, sustainable and biodegradable

 Wild olive tree stem cells (proprietary), Vitamin D nectar, Vegan Shine Beautifier Complex (proprietary), Bioactive 24k gold, organic argan oil, vegal keratin, vegetal collagen, moringa peptide (proprietary), Multi-vitamin B complex, betaine amino acids, Five Trace Elements Protein Complex (proprietary), DNA Protein Repair Complex (proprietary)

title: Colorescience Total Lash Mascara 8ml
category: Brands / Colorescience / Colorescience Total Lash Mascara 8ml
description:
Total Lash™ Mascara immediately enhances the appearance of length and volume for a vibrant, eye-opening effect. With every application, this clinically proven formula works to improve lash health with a blend of peptides and botanicals that nourishes and helps support the natural lash cycle for healthier, stronger, fuller, and longer-looking lashes. 
  Features & Benefits  
 
  +Grow. Supports lash growth cycle to improve length, density, and overall health with continued use 
  +Fortify. Strengthens with botanicals that condition and nourish to prevent brittleness & breakage 
  +Enhance. Immediately enhances appearance of lift, length, and volume with rich black tubing of every lash, while separating for a fanned-out lash 
  Conical brush tip allows for easy application to coat every lash from root to tip, including short inner and outer lashes 
  Tubing mascara is easily and completely removed without aggressive scrubbing when using Colorescience Barrier Pro™ 1-Step Cleanser, or your favorite cleanser. Watch tubes effortlessly slide off the lashes. 
  Non-irritating, all-in-one serum, conditioner, and mascara. Free of prostaglandin analogues, Fragrance-free. Dye-free. Contains beeswax. 
  Clinically proven results. Dermatologist Tested. Ophthalmologist tested. 
 
  Safe for: use around the eye area, sensitive eyes, and contact lens wearers.  
  Why Total Lash™ Mascara  
 
  The all-in-one Serum+ Conditioner + Mascara that is clinically proven to increase lash length, while nourishing, strengthening, and reducing breakage, and offering a buildable high impact look 
  Fans of our multifunctional treatment-makeup-sunscreen hybrids like Face Shields SPF 50 and Total Eye® 3-in-1 Renewal Therapy SPF 35 can complete every look with a high-impact, good-for-you tubing mascara while also providing long-term improvement for their healthiest, rejuvenated lashes 
  A gentle and effective option that is ideal for sensitive eyes, those looking to restore and repair lashes, especially after discontinuing lash extensions, false lashes, or other lash procedures 
  Mascara that further enhances results for users who wish to continue using serums 
 
  Key Ingredients:  
 
  Peptides: Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17 stimulates proliferation of hair follicle cells promoting longer, thicker, and more flexible lashes 
  Panthenol: Strengthening pro-vitamin B5 improves moisture retention and elasticity while thickening the hair 
  Jojoba Seed Oil: Nourishing, nutrient dense emollient hydrator protects hair shaft 
  Burdock Root Extract: Anti-inflammatory antioxidant that reduces dryness and improves resilience 
  Acorus Calamus Root Extract: Botanical extract that is both anti-inflammatory and an antioxidant, and is nutrient rich for optimal root health 
  Glycerin: Conditions skin and hair to promote healthy hair growth 
  Iron Oxides: Mineral pigments that provide immediate long-wear, rich black color. Dye-free color is ideal for sensitive eyes. 
  Copolymer: Extends wear by enhancing adherence and wearability

how_to_use:
AM Daily

On clean, bare lashes, start by placing brush at the root of the lash and gently wiggle the brush side-to-side while swiping upwards toward the tips of lashes. Repeat throughout all lashes, including bottom lashes.
Be sure to get the inner and outer corner lashes. It may be helpful to use the tip of the brush to reach these lashes.
Wait several seconds after each coat before applying the next coat while lashes are still wet.
raw_how_to_use:
AM Daily

  • On clean, bare lashes, start by placing brush at the root of the lash and gently wiggle the brush side-to-side while swiping upwards toward the tips of lashes. Repeat throughout all lashes, including bottom lashes.
  • Be sure to get the inner and outer corner lashes. It may be helpful to use the tip of the brush to reach these lashes.
  • Wait several seconds after each coat before applying the next coat while lashes are still wet.

title: VI Derm Dark Spot Lifting Serum with 5% Tranexamic Acid 50ml
category: Brands / VI Derm / VI Derm Dark Spot Lifting Serum with 5% Tranexamic Acid 50ml
description:
Your effective dark spot fighter. Featuring our revolutionary TRI-ER8ASE™ Acid Complex, lift existing pigment, such as sun damage and melasma, while helping fight future pigment from forming. 
 Tackle dark spots without the prescription. Target, correct and brighten frustrating skin discoloration with VI Derm Dark Spot Lifting Serum with 5% Tranexamic Acid. Our exclusive TRI-ER8ASE™ Acid Complex effectively lifts existing pigment, such as sun damage, and helps fight future pigment for a brighter, more visibly luminous complexion. See results on various types of discoloration including sunspots, dark spots, and melasma. 
  Benefits:  
 
  Lifts existing dark spots, sun damage, and melasma 
  Suppresses melanin production to prevent future dark spots from forming 
  Brightens overall skin tone  
  Gently hydrates and defends against moisture loss 
 
  Ingredients:  
 
  5% Tranexamic acid - A potent acid that helps correct existing dark spots and sun damage

title: The Light Salon Boost LED Bib
category: Brands / The Light Salon / The Light Salon Boost LED Bib
description: Made to medical device directives, our portable Bib for the Neck & Décolletage delivers the same clinically-proven wavelengths as our prestigious professional salon machines. Red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm are the most clinically-proven wavelengths for skin health and rejuvenation, with 830nm achieving the quickest results and client satisfaction. Salon technology at-home. The Boost LED Décolletage Bib gives you a salon-grade LED treatment in the comfortable surroundings of home. With regular 10-minute treatments, skin is plumped, smoothed and re-energised for a healthy and youthful glow. Suitable for all skin tones and types.
ingredients:
Wavelength Call Out:
Red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm are the most clinically-proven wavelengths for skin health and rejuvenation, with 830nm achieving the quickest results and client satisfaction.
Shorter wavelengths such as green, yellow and purple penetrate poorly and are absorbed by melanin and superficial blood. They will not reach the dermis where the main cells for healing and rejuvenation are located, and therefore will not stimulate the production of collagen and elastin.
Longer wavelengths such as red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm penetrate well into the skin and reach the dermis - not only do they stimulate collagen and elastin production (rejuvenating the complexion), they also penetrate deep into the body, reaching muscles, nerves and bone, increasing blood flow and targeting inflammation whilst supporting cellular regrowth and regeneration to help reduce pain and heal injuries.
For the latest information, it is recommended to review the ingredient list printed on the packaging of the product prior to usage or consumption.

Longer wavelengths such as red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm penetrate well into the skin and reach the dermis - not only do they stimulate collagen and elastin production (rejuvenating the complexion), they also penetrate deep into the body, reaching muscles, nerves and bone, increasing blood flow and targeting inflammation whilst supporting cellular regrowth and regeneration to help reduce pain and heal injuries.

Our recommended treatment programme is 10 minutes, 5 days a week for 6 weeks.
A sensitisation patch test must be completed prior to the first time.

title: By Terry Ombre Blackstar Color-Fix Cream Shadow (1.64 g.)
category: Brands / BY TERRY / By Terry Ombre Blackstar Color-Fix Cream Shadow (1.64 g.)
description:
Bestselling 3-in-1 creamy eyeshadow. Eyeliner, illuminator, and eyeshadow. Anti-ageing formula. Buildable coverage for both subtle and dramatic looks. Matte & Shimmer finish. Travel friendly. 
 Glam up the eyes in an instant with the iconic Ombre Blackstar. This multi-purple pen acts as an eyeliner, illuminator, and eyeshadow all in one. Its unique formula is infused with multi-active Tahitian Black Pearl extracts and light-reflecting Tourmaline that help lift the eyelids, making them appear wider and brighter. The creamy, waterproof texture glides on effortlessly and is easy to layer and blend. 
 Easy to blend and highly pigmented, this eyeshadow is designed in 12 vibrant shades for all makeup looks. Available in shimmer finish with 6 unique shades, and matte (NEW) with 6 intense colors: 
 
  100. Matte Bare 
  101.Matte Nude 
  102. Matte Latte 
  103. Matte Toffee 
  104. Matte Ash 
  105. Matte Mokka 
 
  TECHNOLOGY  
 Tahitian Black Pearls Extracts: Rich in fortifying calcium and anti-ageing proteins to care for your eyelids. These ingredients also help to create a creamy formula that glides effortlessly onto the lids, making it easy to apply and blend. 
 Tourmaline: Offers light diffusing properties, anti-ageing properties and detoxification, whilst and enhancing the overall formula. 
 Adhesive Polymers: Provide long-lasting, intense colour. 
  RESULT  
 This multi-purpose, creamy eyeshadow pen helps you master a variety of looks, from a quick and easy smokey eye to a more dramatic eyeshadow style. Flawless and radiant all day, no matter the conditions. Smooth application that blends effortlessly. Waterproof, intense colour. 
  CONSUMER RESULTS  
  TEXTURE  
 
  100%* agree the texture is soft and silky 
  100%* agree the texture does not dry out the eyelids 
  100%* agree the texture does not leave fallout 
 
  APPLICATION  
 
  100%* agree it's an easy-to-blend formula 
  100%* agree it feels smooth and applies evenly 
  100%** agree the product does not crease 
  100%** agree the product is transfer-proof 
 
  RESULTS OVER A 14-DAY PERIOD  
 
  100%** agree the product is long-lasting 
  100%** agree the product provides optimal coverage 
  100%** agree the eyelids appear smoothed and scuplted 
  100%** agree the gaze is luminous and perfected. 
  100%** agree the product is waterproof 
 
  *Satisfaction test performed on 24 volunteers.  
  **Satisfaction test performed on 24 volunteers over a 14-day period.

how_to_use:
EYESHADOW

For a buildable wash of colour, apply Ombre Blackstar directly to eyes and then immediately blend with a fluffy eyeshadow brush or a finger until it's seamlessly blended.
Repeat until you get the desired intensity of colour.

EYELINER

For a thin liner effect, rub an eye liner brush into the formula and then apply along the lash line.
Alternatively, for a thicker liner look, apply Ombre Blackstar directly along the lash line. Leave for a defined look or use a small fluffy brush or a finger to diffuse the line for a softer effect.

EYE PRIMER

As a long wear formula, Ombre Blackstar is perfect to use as a base for eye makeup. Simple apply a sheer wash of Ombre Blackstar across the eye area, then apply your eyeliner or eyeshadow over the top.
This will add extra-long wear to your eye look and give the colours extra vibrancy.
Once dried Ombre Blackstar will stay in place, to remove use an oil-based cleanser.
raw_how_to_use:
EYESHADOW

  1. For a buildable wash of colour, apply Ombre Blackstar directly to eyes and then immediately blend with a fluffy eyeshadow brush or a finger until it's seamlessly blended.
  2. Repeat until you get the desired intensity of colour.

EYELINER

  1. For a thin liner effect, rub an eye liner brush into the formula and then apply along the lash line.
  2. Alternatively, for a thicker liner look, apply Ombre Blackstar directly along the lash line. Leave for a defined look or use a small fluffy brush or a finger to diffuse the line for a softer effect.

EYE PRIMER

  1. As a long wear formula, Ombre Blackstar is perfect to use as a base for eye makeup. Simple apply a sheer wash of Ombre Blackstar across the eye area, then apply your eyeliner or eyeshadow over the top.
  2. This will add extra-long wear to your eye look and give the colours extra vibrancy.
  3. Once dried Ombre Blackstar will stay in place, to remove use an oil-based cleanser.

title: Augustinus Bader The Serum 15ml
category: Brands / Augustinus Bader / Augustinus Bader The Serum 15ml
description:
Formulated with clean super-hydrators and nature's most effective problem-solvers, this breakthrough serum zeros in on your skin's most persistent challenges. From dehydration, stress, and the signs of aging and environmental damage to the appearance of imperfections and loss of elasticity, The Serum delivers an effortless, all-encompassing solution. Backed by 30 years of visionary science. Powered by TFC8®. 
  Key Ingredients:  
 Augustinus Bader skincare is formulated with sustainably-sourced, high potency botanicals and bio-engineered clean actives, where possible, to reduce environmental impact. 
 
  TFC8®: A complex of natural amino acids, high-grade vitamins and synthesized molecules naturally found in skin, which guides key nutrients and powerful natural ingredients to the skin cells, creating an optimal environment for the body's innate processes of repair and renewal. 
  Vitamin C: A potent, antioxidant-packed boost for the skin. Stimulates the production of collagen for firmer, more resilient skin, while brightening and defending against stress caused by environmental aggressors. 
  Polysaccharide Moisture Complex: A multi-tasking skincare technology for optimal moisture levels. Rehydrates from within while actively preventing water loss, for a complexion that is fresh, supple and soft. 
  Squalane: A clean, plant-derived humectant. This intensely hydrating oil effectively attracts and retains moisture for supple, radiant skin with greater bounceback. 
  Sodium Hyaluronate: A salt known to powerfully attract and retain moisture. Helps stimulate cellular cohesion, for youthful, healthy-looking skin that is firm and supple. Rehydrates at a deep level to plump up the skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. 
  Pomegranate Seed Concentrate: A sustainably sourced, antioxidant-rich extract packed with micronutrients and punicic and linolenic fatty acids. Supports skin's self-renewal mechanisms to soothe and balance stressed, overly reactive skin while reducing visible signs of aging, including wrinkles. 
  Resveratrol: A natural polyphenol produced by some plants (and famously found in red wine) to defend against injury. Known to have antioxidant properties, offering powerful defense against external aggressors. 
  Edelweiss Extract: A rare star-shaped plant that grows wild in Alpine mountain ranges. Known to lift, smooth and tighten sagging skin and wrinkles while offering serious protection against oxidative stresses such as pollution and UV radiation. 
  Rice Bran Oil: A revered beauty secret for centuries, naturally derived and packed with antioxidant-rich ferulic acid. Known to help suppress the formation of fine lines and wrinkles, brown spots, and other visible signs of premature aging 
 
  Key Benefits:  
 
  Reduces and helps to prevent the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and hyperpigmentation for more youthful looking skin. 
  Improves tone and smooths texture for brighter, more even looking skin. Boosts skin's natural radiance. 
  Supports production of collagen and boosts elasticity for plumper, more resilient skin. 
  Helps lift, smooth and tighten sagging skin, for a firmer, revitalized complexion. 
  Nourishes and hydrates the skin, while preventing moisture loss (TEWL) for supple, refreshed skin with greater bounce-back 
  Balances and calms stressed, overly reactive skin. Helps to reduce redness. 
  Protects against environmental aggressors and oxidative stresses such as pollution and UV radiation.
ingredients:
Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cellulose, Ethylhexyl Polyhydroxystearate, Resveratrol, Squalane, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Maltitol, Leontopodium Alpinum Callus Culture Extract, Xylitylglucoside, Lecithin, Anhydroxylitol, Citric Acid, Xylitol, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Maltodextrin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, O-Cymen-5-Ol, Punica Granatum Extract, Sodium Phytate, Glucose, Xanthan Gum, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Alanyl Glutamine, Arginine, Oligopeptide-177, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Chloride, Phenylalanine, Sisymbrium Irio Seed Oil.

 This serum provides a global action on 3 levels.

 Le Concentré provides an intense brightening effect on the face due to the Egyptian Myrobolan extract. 
 2. A TARGETED APPROACH TO VISIBLY DIMINISHING THE LOOK OF DARK SPOTS 
 With a PATENDED COMPLEX* OF 4 KEY INGREDIENTS, Le Concentré offers an overall action at each stage of the emergence of dark spots and provides a visible rapid and targeted approach on the appearance and the intensity of look of dark spots. 
 3. A PROTECTIVE ACTION 
 Vitamin E Acetate and alpha-Bisabolol of natural origin, contribute to protecting the skin from harmful external factors that can lead to the formation of dark spots. 
 Size and intensity of dark spots look diminished. Skin seems brighter, more transparent and crystalline, with the overall complexion looking more even. 
 *patent pending

category: Brands / RMS Beauty / RMS Beauty Hydra Setting Powder 10g (Various Shades)
description:
A longwearing, talc-free, skincare-infused loose setting powder available in three sheer, soft-focus shades. 
  Key Ingredients:  
 HerbalHydrate: A complex of water-soluble, plant-derived actives including Cogon Grass Root, Club Moss, and Glycerin in 100% vegetable capsules that allow for moisturizing benefits in a powder, boosting hydration and helping to prevent skin dryness. 
 Gel2Powder Technology: This advanced gel-to-powder technology creates a lightweight, bouncy texture that glides on smooth and provides long-lasting, multi-dimensional wear. 
 Wildcrafted Buriti Oil: Native to Brazil, Buriti Oil is rich with vitamins that offer potent antioxidant protection. 
 Organic Jojoba Oil: Rich in antioxidants, Jojoba Oil mimics the natural oils found in our skin to allow for easy absorption of nourishing skin benefits, while creating a protective barrier from environmental stressors and free radicals. 
 Vegetable Squalane: A moisture-rich, plant-based emollient that hydrates skin and balances oil production while improving skin elasticity.

title: Estée Lauder Perfectionist Pro Rapid Brightening Treatment Ferment³+ Vitamin C 30ml
category: Brands / Estée Lauder / Estée Lauder Perfectionist Pro Rapid Brightening Treatment Ferment³+ Vitamin C 30ml
description:
Triple-active power. Inspired by professional treatments, this Vitamin C powered serum rapidly ignites skin's radiance and targets multiple types of dark spots to reveal a more even-toned look. 
  1 WEEK  
 
  96% said skin felt smoother.(1) 
  93% said their complexion looked healthy.(1) 
  87% said skin looked brighter with renewed clarity.(1) 
 
 Visible improvement(2) in radiance, even tone, smoothness and texture. 
  2 WEEKS  
 
  Dark spots look reduced-both in intensity and contrast(3) 
  84% of women said their skin looked more even-toned.(4) 
 
  1 BOTTLE  
 
  With one 1.7oz./50ml bottle, see a significant reduction in the look of: 
  Dark spots, sun spots, age spots 
  Discoloration, uneven tone 
  Post-acne marks 
  Pores 
 
 Inspired by professional treatments, it rapidly brings radiance and luminosity to dull, lackluster skin. Targets the appearance of multiple types of spots and uneven skintone. Anti-oxidants help protect against environmental damage and the formation of new skin discolorations. Reveals the look of more even-toned, dewy, glowing skin. 
 Proven effective for all skintones. 
  3 POWER FERMENTS + VITAMIN C  
 With its exclusive complex of radiance-boosting actives, this Ferment³ plus Vitamin C serum helps CALM skin so it can help resist irritation-induced dark spots. Helps BREAK the cycle of dullness. Helps BLOCK the appearance of future dark spots with powerful anti-oxidants. And helps BOOST an undeniable clarity. 
  What is Ferment³?  A powerful triple-ferment combining a high concentration of our exclusive Yeast Ferment with a spot-targeting Molasses Ferment plus a proprietary Algae Ferment with powerful soothing activity. All three ferments work to help reduce the appearance of dark spots and enhance clarity and calm for glowing skin. Estée Lauder scientists are experts in fermentation, a process that concentrates and amplifies an ingredient. Our ferment complex is 98% naturally derived.(5) 
  What is Vitamin C?  It's a renowned radiance-boosting, anti-aging and skin-boosting active. In this Rapid Brightening Ferment³ + Vitamin C serum, it targets dark spots in the deepest layer of skin's surface to help reduce the look of skin discolorations. And with its anti-oxidant properties, it helps prevent the appearance of new spots and skin discolorations. 
  GOES ON LIGHTWEIGHT. FEELS FRESH. ULTRA HYDRATING.  
 The fast-absorbing formula of the Rapid Brightening Treatment helps smooth skin's texture and enhance the natural radiance of your glowing skin. With anti-irritants and a potent dose of Hyaluronic Acid, this Ferment³ + Vitamin C serum infuses skin with plumping, soothing, 48H moisture. Anti-oxidants help protect against environmental damage and the formation of new skin discolorations. Oil-free. Gentle on all skintypes. 
 Derm-inspired. Clinically tested. 
 (1) Consumer testing on 280 women after using product for 1 week. 
 (2) Clinical testing on 114 women after using product for 1 week. 
 (3) Clinical testing on 114 women after using product for 2 weeks. 
 (4) Consumer testing on 280 women after using product for 2 weeks. 
 (5) Per ISO Standard 16128. From plant sources, non-petroleum mineral sources, and/or water.

title: Christophe Robin Purifying Mask with Thermal Mud 250ml
category: Brands / Christophe Robin / Christophe Robin Purifying Mask with Thermal Mud 250ml
description:
Ideal for stressed-out scalps and dry hair, the Christophe Robin Purifying Mask with Thermal Mud is a weekly pre-wash hair mask formulated to detoxify and refresh. The purifying treatment works to draw out the build-up of impurities, while enhancing hair’s moisture. 
 Fortified with mineral-rich thermal mud, the formula helps to balance the scalp in order to minimise the look of oily, greasy roots. Spirulina, a nutrient-rich algae, supports the scalp's natural barrier function, helping to shield it from pollution. 
 Designed to be used weekly before shampooing, the hair mask acts as the first step in promoting healthy-looking hair and a comfortably refreshed scalp.

how_to_use:
On Damp Hair: Once a week, or as a quick-fix refresher treatment, dampen hair and massage product onto the scalp and roots. Leave on for 3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly.
On Dry Hair: For a more intensive detox, smooth generously through dry hair from root to tip, leave on for 15 minutes, and rinse thoroughly. Follow with the Purifying Shampoo with Thermal Mud for a deep cleanse, then the Purifying Conditioner Gelée with Sea Minerals to detangle if needed.

category: Brands / DERMAFLASH / DERMAFLASH Luxe+ Advanced Sonic Dermaplaning and Peach Fuzz Removal - Sea Foam
description:
Advanced sonic dermaplaning for professional results at home 
 The most powerful sonic dermaplaning device you can buy, LUXE+ reveals radiant skin in a Flash. Award-Winning Sonic Technology offers superior exfoliation of dead skin cells and maximum removal of dull build-up + peach fuzz. You'll see smooth, glowing skin instantly-plus younger-looking skin over time. Skincare penetrates better, makeup glides on like silk. 
 
  Professional dermaplaning results at home 
  For all ages, skin types and tones-even sensitive 
  CLINICALLY PROVEN hair will NOT grow back thicker or faster 
  2 speeds to customize your treatment 
  Recommended by dermatologists + estheticians

  Salicylic Acid + Papaya Enzymes exfoliate and brighten 
  Willow Bark helps soothe skin 
  Niacinamide helps protect skin's barrier 
  Witch Hazel removes excess oil from skin's surface

 PREFLASH® packaging is made from 41% post-consumer recycled plastic.
how_to_use:
Prepare skin with PREFLASH to remove surface oil and temporarily make skin tighter, for effortless removal of peach fuzz + dead skin. ​
Hold your LUXE Edge at a 45° angle to your face. With your opposite hand, hold skin taut and Flash using short, feathery strokes.​
Apply your favorite serum or moisturizer. Skincare actives will absorb better and makeup will glide on like silk.

Free of color, parabens and scent, this lightweight product leaves hair feeling softer and smoother thanks to a mix of hydrolyzed elastin and amino silicone.

title: miriam quevedo Extreme Caviar Shampoo For Color Treated Hair (250 ml.)
category: Brands / miriam quevedo / miriam quevedo Extreme Caviar Shampoo For Color Treated Hair (250 ml.)
description:
Gently cleanse your hair without stripping its color with miriam quevedo's Extreme Caviar Shampoo For Color Treated Hair. Free of sulfates and parabens, this formula supplies your scalp and strands with nutrient-rich ingredients, such as caviar, B vitamins and botanical extracts. 
  Key Ingredients:  
 
   Caviar:  one of the most exclusive anti-aging cosmetic ingredients given its abundant composition of essential amino acids, structuring peptides, proteins, essential fatty acids and trace elements. 
   Keratin Protection and Rebuilding System:  repairs, replenishes and protects keratin, the key structural component found in hair by creating a weightless film that overlays the hair fiber. 
   Marine Collagen Peptide:  provides softening and conditioning effects while creating a protective film from root to tip and repairing damaged hair. 
   Multi-Vitamin B Complex:  a cocktail of five B vitamins (Thiamine – B1, Riboflavin -B2, Nicotinamide - B3, Panthenol- B5 and Pyridoxine - B6), defends against oxidative stress, protects and repairs hair’s natural keratin and promotes healthy hair growth. 
   Complex of 12 Botanical Extracts:  a potent combination of natural botanicals to treat various concerns including hair loss, oily hair, seborrhea and dandruff. 
 
  Key Benefits:  
 
  Minimizes color loss by successive washes 
  Gentle, not harsh on hair or scalp 
  Provides a polishing effect by preventing cuticle desquamation 
  Restructures broken keratin links, protects against hair collagen degradation and repairs hair’s hydrolipid barrier 
  Antioxidant, anti-free radical and protective properties

description:
This portable tinted mineral sunscreen stick quickly applies sheer SPF 40 coverage and blends in with all skin tones. Shop this water-resistant SPF stick today! 
 Small in size, big on benefits. This grab-and-go tinted mineral sunscreen stick with SPF 40 is lightweight, silky-smooth, and blends into every skin tone effortlessly (with no white cast), to deliver a beautiful hint of tint to cheeks, nose, forehead, ears or shoulders -pretty/perfect protection for anywhere the sun would kiss. Enriched with vitamins C & E to help protect and nourish, shea butter to add extra softness, and our proprietary ProVention-R® technology to protect, prevent and restore-you'll never want to leave home without it. 
 Perfectly portable, it fits easily into any travel bag, pocket or purse. 
  What is ProVention-R® technology?  
 At the heart of all our formulas is our proprietary ProVention-R® technology- a combination of powerhouse ingredients that work to protect, against harmful UV rays and environmental aggressors, prevent future damage and restore skin health. 
  Why we love it:  
 
  Oil-free mineral feel-great formula 
  Universally flattering sheer hint of tint 
  Perfectly portable convenient packaging 
  Safe for the whole family (including kids 6 months+) 
  SPF 40 protection 
  Vitamins C & E help protect and nourish

  Safe for sensitive skin, including rosacea, acne-prone, melasma and eczema-prone

title: ghd Platinum+ Styler - 1" Flat Iron (Black)
category: Brands / ghd / ghd Platinum+ Styler - 1" Flat Iron (Black)
description:
A smart styler with predictive technology for stronger hair & 2x more color protection.* This flat iron is a 3x winner of Allure Best of Beauty award! 
 Ultra-zone predictive technology monitors heat 250x per second across the plates and recognizes the thickness of your hair and speed at which you are styling to adjust the power accordingly. It ensures the optimum styling temperature of 365°F to deliver ultimate results, personalized to you. 
  Key Benefits:  
 
  Pre-set to the optimum styling temperature of 365°F for no extreme-heat styling damage. 
  70% stronger hair* 
  75% more shine** 
  2x more color protection* 
  Proven to deliver sleeker, smoother & healthier looking hair.* 
  Precision milled plates with ultra gloss coating for instant frizz-free styling 
  Unique wishbone hinge and rounded barrel enables versatile, snag-free styling to create flat iron waves, curls and sleek styles 
  3 Year Warranty 
  Comes with a heat resistant, protective plate guard 
  Universal voltage 
  Single-pass styling 
  Heats up in 20 seconds 
  Automatic sleep mode after 30 minutes of non-use 
  Professional length 9 ft. cord 
 
   DISCLAIMER:   
  *reduced breakage and 2x less color fade vs a styler working at 440º F. 
  **proven to increase shine vs. naturally dried hair.
how_to_use:
Use on dry hair.
Section hair into 1" sections.
Ensure that the styler is as close to the root as possible before closing the plates.
Gently move toward the tip of the section in one simple gliding motion.
Repeat the process with each section of hair, gliding once from roots to ends.
raw_how_to_use:
• Use on dry hair.
  • Section hair into 1" sections.
  • Ensure that the styler is as close to the root as possible before closing the plates.
  • Gently move toward the tip of the section in one simple gliding motion.
  • Repeat the process with each section of hair, gliding once from roots to ends.

title: VIRTUE Refresh Dry Shampoo (1.8 oz.)
category: Brands / VIRTUE  / VIRTUE Refresh Dry Shampoo (1.8 oz.)
description:
VIRTUE® Refresh Dry Shampoo is a weightless spray that absorbs buildup and revives style with each use. This invisible, clean aerosol spray dispenses as a dry mist that works to soak up excess oils while adding health-boosting Alpha Keratin 60ku®, leaving hair and scalp refreshed and clean to the touch. This invisible, super-light formula truly cleanses the hair while it enhances scalp health. Created without any heavy styling ingredients that can add more build-up, it’s a reinvigorating pick-me-up for hair in need of a refresh. 
  Key Ingredients:   
 
   Alpha Keratin 60ku® : binds directly to areas of damage and fills them in, repairing and revealing hair that’s shinier, stronger and healthier 
   Tapioca Starch : a natural, non-GMO starch with exceptional oil absorption properties; brushes cleanly from hair 
   Kaolin : a highly refined, pure clay that helps remove impurities from hair 
   Baobab Seed Oil : from the African Tree of Life (known for its ability to store water), this rich, silky oil is an intense emollient for dry, damaged hair 
   Cynara Scolymus (Artichoke) Leaf Extract : a natural extract known to preserve cuticle cohesion and help protect hair from environmental aggressors 
 
  Key Benefits:   
 
  Cleanses hair and refreshes the scalp 
  Revives style without buildup 
  Removes impurities and soaks up excess oils 
  Free of sulfates, parabens, phthalates, synthetic colors, and dyes; gluten and cruelty-free 
 
  Clinical Studies*:   
 
  94% of women said their hair instantly smelled cleaner 
  92% of women felt their hair smelled fresher and looked less oily all day long 
  92% of women said that they were able to refresh and maintain their look throughout the day and that product allowed for easy, buildable styling 
  90% of women said product goes on invisibly 
 
 *Consumer perception study of 53 women. Participants responded to questions after the first use, 8 hours and 4-6 uses over a 1 week period.
ingredients:

how_to_use: Shake well before using. Hold can 6–8 inches away from hair and spray evenly throughout roots. Let product absorb oil for 10 seconds. Massage loosely with fingertips or brush through lightly if desired. For best results, shampoo and condition hair with Virtue® care products. On clean, blow-dried, and styled hair, use the Dry Shampoo at the root immediately after styling to stop oil buildup before it starts. Can also be used on second-day hair in the morning or throughout the day to cut through any oil that has accumulated. For special-occasion hair, before setting or combing out, spray the product lightly throughout to give a bit of grip for hair that is too soft to immediately hold style—this will also add staying power to an up-do. Finish with Shaping Spray for weightless hold to lock in style.

Finish with Shaping Spray for weightless hold to lock in style.

description:
EltaMD UV Clear Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 provides protection to your complexion to shield your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Fragrance-free, this face sunscreen's smooth formula includes sodium hyaluronate to moisturize while lactic acid refines the skin to clear pores and reduce shine. 
 EltaMD UV Sport Broad-Spectrum SPF 50 (formerly UV Sport SPF 50) provides long-lasting protection during sun exposure and physical activities that cause perspiration. Zinc oxide keeps UVA and UVB sun rays from causing damage and accelerate early signs of aging. The lightweight formula dries to clear finish and is water-resistant up to 80 minutes. Ideal for use on entire body and for all skin types. 
  Bundle Includes:  
 
  EltaMD UV Clear Broad-Spectrum SPF46 
  EltaMD UV Sport Broad-Spectrum SPF50 (8 oz)

how_to_use:
Step 1: Apply TINTED COVER FOUNDATION or TINTED BLUR FOUNDATION STICK to even out skin tone.
Step 2: SCULPT – Choose your TINTED BLUR SCULPT STICK.
Tips: Want defined cheekbones? Stripe Tinted Blur Stick along hollows of cheeks. Buff & blend. Want a lift? Stripe Tinted Blur Stick onto cheekbones on a diagonal. Buff & Blend upwards towards temples. Want a less defined forehead? Swipe along forehead into hairline. Buff & blend towards temples. Want a chiseled jawline? Swipe along length of jaw and chin. Buff & blend downward.
Complete the Look - MIX YOUR STIX: Add NUDIES MATTE ALL-OVER FACE BLUSH COLOR, NUDIES BLOOM ALL-OVER FACE DEWY COLOR or NUDIES MATTE LUX ALL-OVER FACE BLUSH COLOR to cheeks as well as a hint across the bridge of nose for a healthy pop of colour. Apply NUDIES GLOW ALL-OVER FACE HIGHLIGHT COLOR on highpoints of the face, inner eye corners and cupid’s bow for a lit-from-within glow.
When applying, slightly roll up only (1/4 inch) to avoid stress on stick. Store product at room temperature (less than 22°C) and avoid direct heat to avoid softening.

title: LightStim for Wrinkles - White (5 Piece - $349 Value)
category: Brands / LightStim / LightStim for Wrinkles - White (5 Piece - $349 Value)
description:
Give yourself the beautiful skin you deserve. Reduce and eliminate fine lines and wrinkles. Maintain your skin's youthful appearance. Nourish your skin from within. 
  What Is LightStim?  
 LightStim delivers light energy in a similar way plants absorb light energy from the sun. Each LightStim device uses different wavelengths, or colors of light. LightStim for Wrinkles provides rejuvenating wavelengths of light energy to treat fine lines and wrinkles. Over time by using your Light you can help to recapture a plump, youthful appearance. 
  Results  
 100% of participants were shown to have improvement in the first 2-4 weeks of use. 
  Professional Strength  
 LightStim LED light therapy devices have been used and recommended by medical spas, estheticians, dermatologists, plastic surgeons, and their clients for 20 years. Now you can experience the same professional strength treatment at home. 
  FDA Cleared  
 LightStim for Wrinkles is FDA Cleared to treat wrinkles on the entire face. You can treat your forehead, crow's feet, cheeks, nasolabial folds, jawline and even your lips. 
  Clinically Proven Results  
 In FDA clinical studies, 100% of participants were shown to have significant improvement in their fine lines and wrinkles in just 8 weeks. 
  Designed to Last a Lifetime  
 Manufactured in the USA at the LightStim Medical Device-Certified Headquarters. Maintenance free. No cartridges, LEDs, or battery replacement costs. Five-year warranty. LightStim for Wrinkles comes with a 90-Day 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. 
  LightStim MultiWave® Patented Technology  
 LightStim has advanced NASA's LED technology to a new level, developing LightStim MultiWave® Patented Technology to simultaneously emit multiple wavelengths (colors) of light. These wavelengths of light work together to give your skin amore radiant and youthful appearance. 
  LEDs are Therapeutic  
 LED stands for Light Emitting Diode, which is a tiny computer chip encased in glass. Each LED wavelength (color) of light provides unique therapeutic benefits. LED is non-invasive, painless and requires no recovery time. This Light is good for all skin types and is engineered to emit a soothing, gentle warmth. LightStim for Wrinkles utilizes wavelengths of Amber, Light Red, Dark Red and Infrared with a total of 72 LEDs. 
  What's Included:  
 PhotoSerum, Sheet Masque and Beauty Case Included 
 Nourish your skin with our proprietary blend of custom LightStim Skincare. Use the LightStim Beauty Case for daily storage and travel to keep your Light shining bright.
how_to_use:
Place the Light gently touching your skin and hold it in place. The Light will beep after 3 minutes.
*If desired, close the eye nearest to the Light. Move the Light to a new area. Repeat until you've treated all desired areas. Use your Light no more than 3 minutes per area, once daily

title: iS Clinical SHEALD Recovery Balm (0.5 oz.)
category: Brands / iS Clinical / iS Clinical SHEALD Recovery Balm (0.5 oz.)
description:
iS Clinical's SHEALD Recovery Balm encourages skin's natural healing process as it alleviates irritation caused by laser, microdermabrasion and chemical treatments. Oat extracts soothe inflammation while panthenol restores pH levels. An advanced complex of ceramides lock-in moisture behind an antimicrobial protective layer that blocks environmental aggressors while keeping skin nourished. 
  Key Ingredients:  
 
   Ceramides:  a group of lipid molecules bioidentical to those synthesized by the stratum corneum. Necessary for healthy barrier function. Antimicrobial and important for apoptosis and cell signaling of functional epithelium. 
   Panthenol (Vitamin B5):  essential element required for enzymatic functions within all cells. Enables the metabolism of carbohydrates, proteins and lipids, increasing cellular integrity and efficiency 
   Antioxidants:  extremozymes, our proprietary combination of extremophilic enzymes, clinically proven to protect and repair fragile proteins and DNA components 
   Blue Micro Algae Extract:  antioxidant and protective properties help defend against free radicals caused by UV-light and pollutants while encouraging the cellular regeneration process 
 
  Key Benefits:  
 
  Provides antioxidant-rich protective barrier 
  Softens and hydrates dry, sensitive skin 
  Helps with tightness and distressed skin 
  Ideal protective moisturizer for harsh cold and/or dry climates 
  Paraben-free

how_to_use:
With 12% non-nano zinc oxide, our formulation ensures unparalleled defense and sun protection by effectively blocking over 98% of UVA and UVB radiation.This non-toxic formulation is rich in antioxidants, reducing pollution-induced free radicals and forming a luminous shield that also blocks over 35% of blue light (HEVL). It provides comprehensive protection against environmental stressors and caters to all skin types and shades.
In addition to its protective power and anti-aging benefits, holi (sun) is free from parabens, silicones alcohol and synthetic fragrance. The formulation is reef-friendly. Designed to nurture firm and supple skin, clinical studies show that the formulation boosts antioxidant activity within the skin by an astonishing 200%. It contains bioactive plum-based complexes that hydrate the skin and stimulate collagen and fibronectin synthesis, effectively helping to slow down the aging process, while also improving skin hydration by up to 60% after 30 minutes. The high content of Vitamin C and Vitamin E in holi (sun) helps strengthen the skin's barrier function, while boosting optimal hydration and a radiant, luminous appearance. Whatever shade you choose, holi (sun) helps to minimize the appearance of pores while delivering hydrating, anti-aging, and anti-inflammatory properties for your sunkissed skin.

title: Masktini Intensive Restorative Crème - Hush Money 50ml
category: Brands / MASKTINI / Masktini Intensive Restorative Crème - Hush Money 50ml
description:
An anti-aging skin barrier, this day and night facial moisturizer is perfect for all skin types. This combination of Vitamin C, our all-natural retinol alternative and a unique plant derived super-hydrator improves skin’s radiance and firmness. An extract of the summer snowflake bulb has Botox mimicking smoothing results, while Matrixyl 3000™ peptides restore collagen synthesis, providing long term anti-wrinkle benefits. 
  Key Ingredients:  
 TETRAHEXYLDECYL ASCORBATE - A highly stable form of Vitamin C which is known for antioxidant benefits, improving radiance, skin texture, firmness and skin tone. Regarded as a gentler, skin-friendly form of Vitamin C that provides all the benefits without irritation. 
 SYSTENOL-A - Bukuchiol is a natural retinol alternative which is an oil extracted from the Psoralea corylifolia or Babchi plant found in India. This compound has been clinically shown to enhance collagen and elastin synthesis, improving fine lines, wrinkles and firmness. 
 NP MOIST 24 - Extracted from the Japanese Bloodgrass root, this water-based complex has been clinically shown to increase skin’s moisture level by 45%, lasting up to 24 hours after application. 
 SALIPORINE-8 - Derived from the halophyte, a plant that grows in salt waters, this extract of Salicornia herbacea has strong antioxidant benefits that also strengthens the hydrolipic barrier of the epidermis and supports the skin’s own moisture production. 
 IBR SNOWFLAKE - A derivative of the summer snowflake bulb, this ingredient contains alkaloids known to have muscle relaxant properties. Lessen facial muscle contractions for a softened appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. 
 MATRIXYL 3000 - A synthetic peptide, or amino acid chain sometimes referred to as protein fragments, works to restore and maintain skin’s youthful appearance by signaling cells to produce more collagen. Clinical studies have shown a reduction of deep wrinkles by 45% after 8 weeks of use. 
 ANTARCTICINE - a glycoprotein from the Antarctic Sea. Prevents the skin from dryness and extreme colds. Boosts collagen and elastin production. Presents significant anti-wrinkle activity. 
 LPD MULTIVITAMIN - a proprietory complex of A,C,E,F vitamins. A true multivatamin for your skin. Helps to downregulate sebum production, revert photodamage, protect against oxidative damage. Regulates collagen synthesis and provides photoprotection. Regenerates membranes and tissues for a healthy beautiful skin. 
 NIACINAMIDE PC - a proprietory grade of Vitamin B3. Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, protect from UV and blue light damage, improve elasticity of the skin, rebalance uneven skin tone. 
 ECTOIN - a natural compound. Helps maintain balanced hydration by maintaining the correct water balance in skin. In doing so, skin can better maintain a smooth, soft surface.

title: Alterna CAVIAR Anti-Aging Replenishing Moisture Hair Oil 50ml
category: Brands / Alterna / Alterna CAVIAR Anti-Aging Replenishing Moisture Hair Oil 50ml
description:
Alterna transcends ordinary haircare - with healthy, sensorial rituals and clean, skincare-inspired formulas - elevating everyday moments into self-care experiences that transform the hair and delight the senses. Our family of mindfully formulated products are designed to deliver performance without compromise-clean beauty that provides an exceptionally luxurious experience at home and proven results in the salon. 
 Apply a couple of drops of our fast-absorbing hair oil on clean, damp, or dry hair. This oil not only leaves hair feeling deeply conditioned and smooth but also strengthens it, making it 9 times more resistant to breaking*. Its lightweight formula offers 72-hour humidity resistance**, without leaving any residue, ensuring that it leaves hair looking healthy and feeling silky soft. Formulated with care, it includes our Marine Moisture complex, a blend of marine plant extracts such as Sea Kelp, Plankton, Ascophyllum, Fucus, and Sea Fennel. Use more as needed, whether as a leave-on treatment or finisher. 
 This oil is formulated without added parabens, SLS/SLES***, phthalates, synthetic color, gluten, mineral oil, oxybenzone, triclosan, coal tar, and formaldehydes and formaldehyde-releasing agents. 
 *against combing breaking on damaged vs. a non-conditioning shampoo 
 ** vs. untreated hair in high humidity conditions 
 *** Formulated added Sodium Lauryl Sulfate or Sodium Laureth Sulfate

title: PCA SKIN Intensive Brightening Treatment 0.5 Pure Retinol Night (1 oz.)
category: Brands / PCA SKIN / PCA SKIN Intensive Brightening Treatment 0.5 Pure Retinol Night (1 oz.)
description:
Rejuvenate your complexion while you slumber with the PCA Skin Intensive Brightening Treatment: 0.5% Pure Retinol Night. Working with your body's natural renewal process, this potent treatment delivers pure, potent ingredients deep within your skin to promote a clear, radiant expression. Using a patented OmniSome delivery system, retinol is absorbed into your skin. 
 The cocktail of vitamins and antioxidants promotes radiance from within while correcting environmental damage and discoloration on the surface of your skin. 
  Key Ingredients and Benefits:  
 
   Retinol:  stimulates cell turnover and renewal to smooth and soften skin 
   Resveratrol:  a potent antioxidant that encourages a bright, even skin tone 
   Niacinamide:  reduces excess oil production and lightens discoloration to brighten skin 
   Hexylresorcinol:  reduces inflammation and promotes an even skin tone 
 
  Due to a manufacturer packaging change, item received may vary from product image.

how_to_use:
In the evening only, apply a pea-sized amount after cleansing. Use twice per week, gradually increasing application frequency to every other night, and then advancing to each evening or as tolerated. Follow with the appropriate moisturizer.
Warning: Mild irritation may initially be experienced and is not a sign of a negative complication. This product is indicated for use in the evening only.
Note: It is important to wear a broad spectrum SPF during the day when using this product at night, since retinol is sun sensitizing.

description:
Summer may only come once a year, but the versatile, 3-in-1 Neo-Bronzer from Kevyn Aucoin keeps that healthy glow going year-round. From a scale of naturally sun-kissed to tropically bronzed, the trio palette gives you the option to use as you please with a combination of highlighting and bronzing shades in a smooth, gradient finish. The finely milled, light-diffusing pigments enhance all complexions and skin tones, maximizing skin’s radiance with pure warmth—like you just spent a day at the beach. 
  Key Benefits:  
 
  Highlighter, blush, and bronzer all in one smooth gradient finish 
  Can be used individually, or blended together for a customized, bronzed glow 
  Can also be used to sculpt 
 
  Sundown Deep has a matte finish.

  GrandeMASCARA:  Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17: helps to strengthen and fortify for healthier looking lashes

how_to_use:
GrandeLASH-MD: As with all cosmetic products used in the area of the eye (or close proximity to the eye), it is important to carefully read all directions and warnings.
Carefully apply GrandeLASH-MD once daily on a clean, dry upper lash line only using a single stroke on your eyelid just above your upper lash line (like a liquid eyeliner). Do not apply to the lower lash line. Apply only with the product applicator provided. Use one dip into the bottle for both upper lash lines and allow 2-3 minutes for the serum to fully dry before lying down or applying other products to your eye area. Use sparingly.
If serum gets into the eye, immediately rinse thoroughly with cool water to completely remove serum from the eye. Apply every day for a full 3 months. After desired improvement is achieved, apply every other day for maintenance. GrandeLASH-MD requires continued use to maintain benefits.
This cosmetic product contains (a small amount of) isopropyl cloprostenate, an analog of prostaglandin. It is important to use the product as instructed so that it does not get into the eye. As instructed in the directions for application, if product does come into contact with the eye, immediately rinse thoroughly with cool water to completely remove the cosmetic serum from the eye. If redness, irritation or other unwanted effects occur, stop using product immediately. If symptoms persist, seek medical attention.
GrandeBROW: As with all cosmetic products used in the area of the eye (or close proximity to the eye), it is important to carefully read all directions and warnings.
Carefully apply GrandeBROW once daily on a clean, dry brow to the natural shape of your brow, concentrating on sparse, thinning or over-plucked areas. Apply only with the product applicator provided. Allow 2-3 minutes for the serum to fully dry before applying other products to your brow or eye area. If serum gets into the eye, immediately rinse thoroughly with cool water to completely remove serum from the eye. Apply every day for a full 4 months.
After desired improvement is achieved, apply every other day for maintenance. GrandeBROW requires continued use to maintain benefits.
This cosmetic product contains (a small amount of) isopropyl cloprostenate, an analog of prostaglandin. It is important to use the product as instructed so that it does not get into the eye. As instructed in the directions for application, if product does come into contact with the eye, immediately rinse thoroughly with cool water to completely remove the cosmetic serum from the eye. If redness, irritation or other unwanted effects occur, stop using product immediately. If symptoms persist, seek medical attention.

 Ideal for all skin types, including mature.

how_to_use:
Trim wicks to 7mm before each use using scissors or a wick trimmer. If wicks are too short the wax may not burn all the way to the edge (tunnelling), and if too long the wicks may appear to mushroom causing black soot to form on the glass.
Place candle in a non-draughty area, away from small children, pets and flammable material.
Do not burn for less than one hour or more than four hours at a time.
raw_how_to_use:
Trim wicks to 7mm before each use using scissors or a wick trimmer. If wicks are too short the wax may not burn all the way to the edge (tunnelling), and if too long the wicks may appear to mushroom causing black soot to form on the glass.

Place candle in a non-draughty area, away from small children, pets and flammable material.

Do not burn for less than one hour or more than four hours at a time.

title: ClarityRx Take It Easy Calming Serum 15ml
category: Brands / ClarityRx / ClarityRx Take It Easy Calming Serum 15ml
description:
Take It Easy™ Calming Serum is an all-natural formula used to reduce the appearance of redness and inflammation.  Helps to significantly calm the skin while also improving texture, enhancing hydration and softening the skin. 
  Key Ingredients:  
 Hyaluronic Acid – helps reduce the visibility of fine lines and wrinkles by retaining moisture, creating a plumping effect in the skin. Also contains anti-inflammatory properties, which can help reduce the redness associated with rosacea and inflammation. 
 Saccharide Isomerate – a deeply moisturizing, plant derived ingredient based on its unique composition, similar to that of the carbohydrate complex found in human skin and on its unique ability to bind to skin cells. Provides deep hydration and creates moisture that lasts. 
 Chrysanthellum indicum – provides a documented effect on vascular wall permeability, improving the mechanical resistance of capillaries.
ingredients:

title: Estée Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Power Bounce Crème Moisturiser 50ml
category: Brands / Estée Lauder / Estée Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Power Bounce Crème Moisturiser 50ml
description:
The nighttime revolution. Boost. Protect. Optimize. 
 Boost your skin's bounce and firmness at night-and see a more lifted look. Plump and deeply hydrate skin until morning and beyond. Soon visible signs of collagen loss are reduced-skin looks more lifted, feels firmer, with wrinkles and neck lines visibly reduced. 
 And every night, you'll love the magical sensation of the transformative texture melting from dense to weightless on your skin. 
  With this peptide night cream:  
 
  15% visible line reduction in just one sleep.(1) 
  Wrinkles and neck lines look reduced over time. 
  Bounce back in just 4 hours.(2) 
  92% said skin bounce improved.(3) 
 
  CLINICAL TESTING PROVED: MORE NIGHT POWER BENEFITS  
 
  +116% moisture boost immediately. (4) 
  In just 4 hours, skin is bouncier. (2) 
  -31% visible irritation within hours. (5) 
  +20% radiance boost upon waking. (1) 
  +15% smoother feeling upon waking. (1) 
  100% of panelists woke up to significantly higher moisture levels. (1) 
  Skin looks more youthful-firmer and less lined. 
 
  UNIQUE TRANSFORMING TEXTURE, IDEAL AT NIGHT  
 The extraordinary Bounce Creme texture magically transforms from dense in the jar to weightless on your skin. 
 
  Bi-layer bouncy texture. 
  Melts on contact to glide over your skin with a silky caress. 
  Absorbs quickly-perfect for bedtime. 
 
 Plus, Double Anti-Pore Power: 
 1. OILY PORES look reduced 
 2. SAGGING PORES bounce back 
 Overall, oil control is boosted. 
 The glass jar is recyclable. 
 For all ages, skintypes and skintones. 
 
  (1) Clinical testing on 25 women 12 hours after a single nighttime product application. 
  (2) Clinical testing on 28 women after 1 product application. 
  (3) Consumer testing on 165 women, after using product for 3 weeks. 
  (4) Clinical testing on 25 women after a single product application. 
 
  Key Ingredients:  
 OPTIMIZE WITH COLLANIGHT-8 TM  
 Did you know? Skin's natural collagen production peaks at night. Night Power Bounce Creme, with exclusive CollaNight-8 TM  technology, leverages our 40 years of Night Science Expertise-and 30 years of Collagen Research. Keeps skin feeling firm and bouncy, and looking younger and smoother. 
 Our CollaNight-8 TM  superblend includes eight powerhouse ingredients to help support skin's natural collagen, including potent Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, our exclusive Moringa Extract, our exclusive Hibiscus Morning Bloom Extract, concentrated Algae Extract, Sigesbeckia Extract and Vitamin E. 
 The anti-oxidants and skin-soothing ingredients in CollaNight-8 TM  help address irritation and environmental stressors that can impact collagen, leading to the appearance of lines, wrinkles, loss of firmness and other signs of aging.

description:
Eminence Organics Hibiscus Ultra Lift Neck Cream is a miracle worker for your neck and decolletage area, the most tell-tale areas to show signs of aging. This highly potent neck lift cream helps rejuvenate and tighten the skin. The blend of hibiscus and botanical hyaluronic acid keeps skin looking firm and rich in moisture. All-natural active ingredients give sagging skin a boost from paprika and edelweiss to ensure the neck looks smooth and instantly lifted. Gluten-free, Nut-free, Vegan. 
  Key Benefits  
 
  Visible results in as little as 2 minutes. 
  The elasticity of skin is improved to instantly look lifted and tightened 
  Wrinkles are smoothed and appear reduced 
  The neck and décolletage area is revitalized and hydrated for younger-looking skin

how_to_use:
Texturizing Wave Mist: Always shake upside down vigorously before use. This versatile hair mist can be applied in two ways for different hairstyles: To define natural waves and curls: Spray on damp hair, lock by lock. Work well with your hand to define the natural wave and then activate the product using a hair dryer. For enhanced results, use a hair diffuser, section by section. To create waves with heat tools: Spray on damp hair, lock by lock. Dry the hair completely before starting to work the hair. Then, create the desired waves with your favorite heat tool, section by section. Uniquely formulated to be layered with other Miriam Quevedo Treatment Stylers as desired. Miriam’s tips: Apply the Black Baccara Hair Repairing & Multiplying Serum on damp hair before spraying the mist to achieve lightness in the hair while taming frizz and static.
Mask: Apply to wet hair and scalp and gently massage. Distribute with downwards strokes starting near the tips working upwards to the roots. Leave on for 5 to 15 minutes. Rinse thoroughly.
Shampoo: Apply to wet hair and scalp. Massage in gently to create lather. Leave on for 2 to 5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.

how_to_use:
Apply to face, neck and décolleté. May be used day and night.

Use the flat side of the baton to scoop out the product, warm up between fingers, then press into the skin.
Using the flat end, massage from the center of the forehead down to the brow, using quick rainbow-like motions towards the temple. Repeat on the other side.
Use the flat faceted side and gently sweep from the cheekbone outward to the jawline. Repeat on the other side.
Tap the flat end of the baton three times at these targeted points of the face: The center of the brows, outer corner of the eyes, under the eyes (on the orbital bone) under the nose, and at the center of the chin.
raw_how_to_use:
Apply to face, neck and décolleté. May be used day and night.

  1. Use the flat side of the baton to scoop out the product, warm up between fingers, then press into the skin.
  2. Using the flat end, massage from the center of the forehead down to the brow, using quick rainbow-like motions towards the temple. Repeat on the other side.
  3. Use the flat faceted side and gently sweep from the cheekbone outward to the jawline. Repeat on the other side.
  4. Tap the flat end of the baton three times at these targeted points of the face: The center of the brows, outer corner of the eyes, under the eyes (on the orbital bone) under the nose, and at the center of the chin.

category: Brands / Natura Bissé / Natura Bissé C+C Vitamin Cream (2.5 oz.)
description:
Natura Bisse's C+C Vitamin Cream helps you achieve a more hydrated, firm and glowing complexion. Designed to diminish the appearance of wrinkles, dark spots and free radical damage, this brightening moisturizer is powered by vitamin C, provitamin D and turmeric oil to guard your skin against environmental aggressors and thwart skin aging. 
  Key Ingredients:  
 
   Antioxidants:  shield your skin from damaging free radicals 
   Shea Butter:  rehydrates and nourishes your skin to diminish dryness 
   Vitamin C:  lightens dark spots and protects your skin against environmental stressors 
   Stabilized Ascorbic Acid:  a potent antioxidant that reduces and prevents wrinkles, and improves skin elasticity and firmness 
   Turmeric Oil:  enhances the skin’s cellular defense mechanisms against oxidative stress, thus protecting the skin against damage caused by sun exposure 
   Provitamin D:  contributes to the generation of optimal levels of vitamin D, a key vitamin to prevent skin aging 
 
  Key Benefits:  
 
  Hydrates and makes skin look firm and supple 
  Boosts luminosity to lend a revitalized complexion 
  Helps diminish the appearance of dark spots and evens out skin tone 
  Results in a radiant complexion 
 
  Tip:  For those exposed to plenty of sun, apply this regularly to help moisturize your skin and improve its appearance. For smokers, this is the ideal formula to restore a luminous appearance and revitalize dull complexions.

title: Elizabeth Arden SuperStart Skin Renewal Booster 50ml
category: Brands / Elizabeth Arden / Elizabeth Arden SuperStart Skin Renewal Booster 50ml
description:
Boost your skin's moisture and resilience with  Elizabeth Arden's SUPERSTART Skin Renewal Booster , a hydrating elixir that works to strengthen skin's natural defences whilst boosting radiance. 
 Caring for the surface of your skin is important; the health and condition of your skin's surface layer has a direct correlation to how radiant and youthful your skin looks. With this in mind, the SuperStart Skin Renewal Booster expertly targets the skin's surface, supporting healthy skin cells and strengthening the natural moisture barrier to ensure skin is left resilient and hydrated. Boosting natural defences and the effectiveness of your skincare regimen, the formula will fortify the skin's ability to repair and renew itself, so you can feel confident your skin looks and feels protected, radiant and younger-looking. 
  Suitable for all skin types.

Longwearing, crease-proof cream eyeshadows in 9 nourishing, metallic, buildable shades.

 Kakadu Plum Seed Oil: One of the most natural and stable forms of Vitamin C, this superfruit has a great source of antioxidants to help plump, brighten, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. 
 Organic Jojoba Oil: Rich in antioxidants, Jojoba Oil mimics the natural oils found in our skin to allow for easy absorption of nourishing skin benefits, while creating a protective barrier from environmental stressors and free radicals. 
 Wildcrafted Buriti Oil: Native to Brazil, Buriti Oil is rich with vitamins that offer potent antioxidant protection. 
 RMS Adaptogenic Herbal Blend: A proprietary blend of 9 rare adaptogenic herbs that help to balance, hydrate, soothe, and soften the skin.

title: Tarte Foundcealer Foundation Brush (1 piece)
category: Brands / Tarte Cosmetics / Tarte Foundcealer Foundation Brush (1 piece)
description:
Press and buff on comfortable, flawless medium-to-full coverage with this cruelty-free, vegan babassu Foundcealer™ Foundation Brush from Tarte Cosmetics. The high-density brush is made of extremely soft synthetic fibers of varying heights that mimic and outperform natural hair making it extremely easy to buff and blend this formula into the skin without streaking. Additionally, the hairs are ultra-dense so the gel formula does not absorb into the brush, leaving you with maximum pigment. 
  Key Benefits:  
 
  Dense, yet soft synthetic bristles 
  Easily blends foundation 
  Delivers custom coverage on the skin 
  Vegan, cruelty-free

title: Erborian Skin Therapy Multi-Perfecting Night Oil-Serum (Various Volume)
category: Brands / Erborian / Erborian Skin Therapy Multi-Perfecting Night Oil-Serum (Various Volume)
description:
Skin Therapy is a new generation of face oil-serum, nourishing but not greasy, supercharged with 17 ingredients and 5 potent renowned add-ons that work from the very first night to visibly improve 7 skin concerns like appearance of fine lines, skin texture and complexion evenness. 
  IN A BI-PHASE OIL-SERUM FOR ALL SKIN TYPES​:  
  1/AQUEOUS PHASE​  
 
  Which delivers all the powers of our super ingredients​ 
 
  2/ OIL PHASE​  
 
  That improves absorption of the ingredients​ 
 
 ONCE SHAKEN THE 2 LAYERS BLEND TOGETHER TO CREATE THE PERFECT LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES (including combination and oily skins)! 
 
   FROM THE 1ST NIGHT: 95% said skin feels softer, suppler, and texture is smoother.*  
   AFTER 28 DAYS OF USE: 95% feel happier looking at their bare skin in the mirror*  
   AFTER 28 DAYS OF USE: 93% feel more confident in their bare skin*  
 
   *Consumer test on 41 volunteers#   
  A powerhouse of ingredients that work in combination to deliver 7 benefits:  
 
   APPEARANCE OF FINE LINES & WRINKLES (2)​:  Thanks to White & Red Ginseng Root Extracts, Wild yam, Kigelia, horsetail, Licorice​ 
   SKIN TEXTURE (1)​:  Thanks to PHA known to help improve skin texture and zinc, known to help improve skin quality​ 
   COMPLEXION EVENNESS (1)​:  Yuzu extract known to help complexion evenness.​ 
   LUMINOSITY (1)​:  Thanks to Red Pepper and PHA which target skin luminosity​ 
   PLUMPNESS (1)​:  Thanks to Squalane & Bamboo extract known to moisturize, while Hyaluronic Acid helps to keep the skin looking plumper.​ 
   NOURISHMENT (1)​:  Thanks to its oil-serum texture. ​ 
   SUPPLENESS (1)​:  Thanks to Hyaluronic acid which targets skins’ hydration leaving the skin more supple.  
 
  SKIN THERAPY  also brings COMFORT to the skin thanks to Japanese knotweed, Scutellaire skullcap, Chamomile, Green tea and Rosemary. Centella Asiatica is known for soothing properties.​ 
  (1) Consumer test on 41 volunteers after 1st night​ 
   (2) Consumer test on 41 volunteers after 14 days
